message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product which I believe would be very valuable to you. I'm thinking of a price around $110. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90.
I understand your position, Bob, but I can't go as low as $90.  How about we meet in the middle at $100?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit higher than $100. How about $95?
